titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation touching common maultsters, and brewers
Proclamations. 1637-07-09
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: ... Greenwich, the ninth day of Iuly, in the thirteenth yeare of His Maiesties reigne.
Arms 24; Steele notation: the sonable 2) the 3) County, tender.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library, Cambridge, England.
